text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hmhm… 
Hmmmhmhmhm…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ack―!! 
I could see it!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm the one who's going to run down the 
Bakushin Road with my overwhelming 
speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Come, now, Trainer, let's 
get this thing going!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
First of all, which race shall we run
for next year's Satsuki Sho!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Since I'm the one running it, it's got
to be a G1! Asahi Hai FS? Maybe the
Hanshin JF!

It's impossible for her to run in a G1 
race if she hasn't proven herself yet. 
If that's the case, what she should be 
running now is…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's hear it!
choice_data_list:
Why don't you run the Keio 
Cup Junior Stakes?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmhm…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait, 1400 meters!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Isn't that a little short to be aiming
for the Satsuki Sho and other Classic
races!?
choice_data_list:
The Junior class races are 
all short distances.

The Junior class races are 
all short distances.

text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I think even 1400m is too 
long for Sakura Bakushin O…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm…! 
For that matter――
choice_data_list: As class president, you have to show your good faith.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hm…!? 
Faith?

It's cool to jump into a G1 race out of 
nowhere, but some people may be so 
surprised by Sakura Bakushin O's speed 
that they'll collapse.

So, I explained to her that she would
first show her face in the Keio Haiyu
Junior Stakes and then gradually let her
speed be known…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's absolutely true―!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Understood. In my next target race, I'm 
going to bring my speed to the world!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So, let's get you used to hearing 
people say "too fast"!

At any rate, this is how I decided our
next target would be the Keio Haiyu
Junior S.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: BakushinBakushiiiin!
